channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 游릭 18:48 WARNING! DRAWING DRONI-KAMKADze #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
